files.patch:
@@ -1519,7 +1519,1 @@ - * Returns the set of all packages in the module. - * - *

The set of packages includes all exported and open packages, as well - * as the packages of any service providers, and the package for the main - * class.

- * - * @return A possibly-empty unmodifiable set of the packages in the module + * {@return a possibly-empty unmodifiable set of all packages in the module}
